project_descr: Empowering Children and Adolescents with Special Needs and their Families:  Towards Inclusive Development and Poverty Alleviation.

outputs.output_descr: This budget revision updates the AWP for 2014 and re-phases activities and resources awarded under the approved project document, and programmed in the 2013 Annual Work Plan, but not implemented during that calendar year.
